info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hamilton, west central Warren and northwestern Saratoga Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Johnsburg, or 12 miles east of Speculator, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wells, Harrisburg, Garnet Lake, Gilmantown, Girards Sugarbush, Griffin and Bakertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
